The claim was made by Festus Keyamo: the media director of President Muhammadu Buhari’s re-election campaign.
The claim stated that Nigeria earned N57: 3. Official statistics from the National Bureau of Statistics showed that Nigeria earned N73.24 billion from agricultural exports in the first quarter of 2018.
Total earnings from all non: oil exports in the first quarter of 2018 were N577.6 billion, which aligns with Keyamo's claim.
